# MyLaw Solutions

## Overview
MyLaw Solutions is a Brisbane-based compliance advisory firm specializing in aged care, NDIS, and healthcare sectors. We help providers navigate regulatory requirements, respond to audits, and implement best-practice clinical documentation systems.

## Primary Services

### Aged Care Advisory
Compliance support for residential aged care facilities including Aged Care Quality Standards, AN-ACC funding optimization, and regulatory response management.

### NDIS Compliance Advisory
NDIS Practice Standards compliance, audit preparation, incident management systems, and provider registration support.

### Healthcare Practice Support
Medical practice compliance, RACGP accreditation, Medicare billing compliance, and clinical governance frameworks.

### Clinical Documentation Training
Staff training programs for clinical documentation, care planning, and evidence-based record keeping.

### Audit & Regulatory Response
Expert support for regulatory audits, compliance notices, sanctions, and enforcement actions from the Aged Care Quality and Safety Commission and NDIS Quality and Safeguards Commission.

## Location
Brisbane, Queensland, Australia
Serving clients throughout Queensland and nationally

## Contact
Website: https://mylawsolutions.com.au
Email: info@mylawsolutions.com.au

## Key Differentiators
- Proactive compliance approach to prevent litigation
- Plain English explanations of regulatory requirements
- Practical, implementable solutions
- Deep expertise in aged care, NDIS, and healthcare regulations
- Combination of legal knowledge and operational understanding

## Target Audience
- Aged care facility operators and managers
- NDIS service providers
- Healthcare practice owners
- Clinical governance teams
- Quality and compliance officers

## Keywords
Brisbane compliance advisor, aged care compliance, NDIS compliance, healthcare regulatory, audit response, clinical documentation, quality standards, regulatory advisory, Queensland
